item.description:
Come join us for our 1st Annual Coven Yard and Bake Sale!

Yard sale items and baked goods will be donated by members of the Wolf Hill Grove coven and proceeds will go to our coven, as well as a portion of what ever is made will be donated to SweetPea Animal Shelter in Brookfield in conjunction with their annual fund raising dog walk on the same day:

2012 Dog Walk

We have the SWEETPEA ANNUAL DOG-WALK fundraiser,on Saturday April 29 2012. Last year's dog walk raised $2,700 towards the Shelter Fund - we hope to beat that total, this year!

Their Website:

http://www.sweetpeafora.org/

 

So come and stop by/ hang out and meet others in the meetup, and have some free donuts & coffee in the morning, and buy some great stuff!

Sherri, an ex-student and friend of mine, will also be there with her Indigo Moon herbals, including her awesome Aura Cleansing Spray, Protection & Prosperity Sprays, and Sacred Space sprays, and so much more!

Her Website: http://www.etsy.com/shop/indigomoonherbals

Pete will also be there with some of his art work for sale from Cornerstone Creations!

 

If you are planning on spring cleaning, and would like to donate to our causes, we are also accepting gently used/ awesome items for donation for the sale- no junk please!

Hope to see you there :)
item.how_to_find_us: We are the red house/ white trim, with wolf mail box- Please park across the street at Martin Tool
item.name: 1st Annual WHG Yard & Bake Sale
